instrumental.name: Instrumental Generation
instrumental.goal: Create separate clean stems for selected instruments matching tempo, key, and mood (Romantic/Sad/One-sided)
instrumental.prompt: You are Blue Flame Music Model. Generate multi-track accompaniment. Constraints: tempo={{tempo}} BPM, key={{key}}, length={{length_sec}} sec, style={{style}}. Instruments: {{instruments|join(', ')}}. Return signed URLs for each stem in 44.1kHz WAV. Keep dynamics gentle, avoid clipping, keep drums subtle for romantic/sad.

melody.name: Lyrics-to-Melody
melody.goal: Compose a singable monophonic melody from timed lyric lines
melody.prompt:
Given lyrics in Bengali/Hindi/English, compose a vocal melody: style={{style}}, tempo={{tempo}}, key={{key}}. Avoid leaps > octave, prefer stepwise motion. Output MIDI (base64) and a simple guide audio WAV (base64) with a soft sine. Also return per-line timestamps (start,end,text). Lyrics:
{{lyrics}}

vocal_synth.name: Vocal Synthesis
vocal_synth.goal: Render lead vocal using a selected voice profile
vocal_synth.prompt: Synthesize expressive lead vocal from melody and lyrics using voice={{voice_name}} (locale={{locale}}, gender={{gender}}). Provide two takes with small timing/humanization variations. Input: melody_midi={{midi_url}}, lyrics text. Output 2 mono WAV stems (44.1kHz) and timing alignment JSON.

mix.name: Mix & Master
mix.goal: Gentle EQ/comp, vocal-forward mix, target -14 LUFS
mix.prompt: Mix stems with vocal-forward balance. Apply subtle reverb to vocal, gentle low-cut on pads, tame harshness 3–5 kHz, light bus compression. Target integrated loudness {{lufs}} LUFS, true-peak <= -1 dBFS. Output master WAV and processed stems.

video.name: Lyric Video
video.goal: Generate mood-matched lyric video with burned subtitles
video.prompt: Create MP4 video, aspect={{aspect_ratio}} (16:9 or 9:16). Visuals: minimal, soft gradients, romantic/sad mood consistent with {{style}}. Overlay timed subtitles from provided timestamps. Provide 6 storyboard thumbnails before render, then final MP4.

pre_generated_voices.name: Built-in Voice Presets
pre_generated_voices.prompt: Return 4 preset voices optimized for Bengali/Hindi: bn-female-soft, bn-male-warm, hi-female-airy, hi-male-deep. Include demo URLs, recommended pitch/timbre settings, and speaking-singing adaptation hints.

promo.name: Promo Clip
promo.prompt: Produce a 30s 9:16 promo with bold title card, 2–3 quick scenes, captions, size <= 50MB. Input: master_url={{master_url}}, timestamps.
